content.text:
Based on my review of CREATOR_POV_V3.md, here are the **completed tasks** and **actionable tasks** we can work on:

## Already Completed âœ“
- Change "Daily Earnings" to "Earnings"
- Change "Daily Messages" to "Messages"
- Remove "Most recent activity" below "Recent Transactions"
- Switch Messages/Recent Transactions sections on mobile
- Remove clipboard/logout popup notifications
- Change "Show Broadcasts" to "Masses"
- Remove "Has Media" filter
- Remove "FIND NEW CREATORS" title when searching users
- Add spacing between folder items
- Remove "NEW" titles from gifts

## High Priority - Ready to Complete Now

### Dashboard Issues
1. **Fix Daily Earnings chart for September 14th data** - Chart not showing when data exists
2. **Fix "Last 30 Days" date display** - Only first 5 days showing, dates duplicated on mobile
3. **Align bottom header with Staryo logo line** (Desktop) - Alignment issue

### Messages Interface
4. **Fix messages not loading before clicking conversation** - Only 1 profile picture loads
5. **Enable "Mass Message" button** - Currently not clickable
6. **Add swipe-to-delete for conversations** - With confirmation popup
7. **Fix Skip button persistence** - Stays visible after gift animation completes (marked [??], needs verification)
8. **Restore "Ready to chat?" empty state** - Re-add title/subtitle, remove duplicate text (marked [??], needs verification)
9. **Fix gift animation re-triggering on new messages** - Animation replays unnecessarily
10. **Enable gift sending** - Currently blocked (all gifts require minimum 1 star)
11. **Fix voice audio sending** - Not working
12. **Enable message editing** - Feature not working

### Creator on User Profile
13. **Fix empty posts view** - Remove square format, increase icon, update text
14. **Add top spacing to profile** - User feels "trapped" with current layout
15. **Remove verified badge from post view** - Badge showing incorrectly when creator views user posts

### Functionalities
16. **Fix referral link destination** - Should direct to app, not signup
17. **Add mass message deletion** - If not already implemented
18. **Clarify "Has Replies" vs "Unread" filters** - Document or fix difference

## Needs Clarification
- **Transaction icon oval shape** (item 23) - Reviewer couldn't find oval shapes, may need screenshot
- **Recent Transactions date display** (item 25) - Allow 2-line display for day/month on mobile

Which area would you like to tackle first? I'd recommend starting with the **Messages Interface** issues since there are several functional bugs there, or the **Dashboard chart issues** since those affect core creator metrics.
